games.name: Pacman
games.description: Pacman is a video game developed by Atari and published by Activision in 1980. The player controls a character named Pac-Man, who must navigate a maze while avoiding ghosts and other obstacles. The game was a commercial success, and is considered one of the most influential video games of all time.

games.name: Super Mario Bros.
games.description: Super Mario Bros. is a 1985 platform video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). It is the first installment in the Super Mario series, and was the first video game to feature a 3D perspective.
